full_summary:
===============

**Title:** Stage 1 - Podium Deck Repairs and Restoration, Banff National Park

**Reference Number:** 5P421-23-0004/A

**Publication Date:** May 4, 2023

**Closing Date:** May 19, 2023 at 4:00 PM MDT

**Background:**

The Parks Canada Agency invites contractors to submit qualifications and bid on the Stage 1 - Podium Deck Repairs and Restoration project at Banff National Park.

**Project Description:**

The contractor will perform the removal and replacement of a waterproofing system at a vacant staff housing building. The work involves the removal of existing pavers, pedestal system, insulation, concrete curbs, and planters. Additionally, the contractor will shim existing stairs to allow access to the concrete surface, replace the existing waterproofing material, and reconstruct or replace all removed elements to match the existing structure.

**Project Estimate:**

The estimated value of the project is between $250,001 and $500,000, including taxes.

**Contract Period:**

The contractor is expected to complete the work by August 31, 2023.

**Bidders' Conference:**

A bidders' conference will be held on May 10, 2023, at 1:30 PM MDT via teleconference to review the scope of work and answer questions.

**Submission Requirements:**

Bidders must submit their qualifications and bid in two stages. The first stage is an Invitation to Qualify (ITQ), and the second stage is an Invitation to Tender (ITT). Bidders must submit their bid electronically to the specified email address, soumissionsami-bidsrpc@pc.gc.ca. Email submissions will be accepted as official.

**Contracting Entity Information:**

The contracting entity is the Parks Canada Agency, located at 30 Victoria Street, Gatineau, Quebec J8X 0B3. The contact information for the contracting authority is as follows:

* Name: Rose Marino
* Email: rose.marino@pc.gc.ca
* Phone: (403) 760-1319

**Submission Deadlines:**

Enquiries regarding the project must be submitted in writing and received no later than five (5) business days prior to the closing date.
